thread.title: LMJM Internet Marketing, LLC Announces Launch of Website Offering Youngevity Health Products at LisasHealthyLifestyle.com with Complementary Blog at YourSustainableSelf.com
thread.title_full: LMJM Internet Marketing, LLC Announces Launch of Website Offering Youngevity Health Products at LisasHealthyLifestyle.com with Complementary Blog at YourSustainableSelf.com

author: admin
title: LMJM Internet Marketing, LLC Announces Launch of Website Offering Youngevity Health Products at LisasHealthyLifestyle.com with Complementary Blog at YourSustainableSelf.com
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: LMJM Internet Marketing, LLC 
DRAPER, Utah, Oct. 5, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- LMJM Internet Marketing, LLC announced today the opening of its new online health store, specializing in highly bioavailable organic plant derived vitamin and mineral supplements, at www.LisasHealthyLifestyle.com . 
"After discovering this product line, I knew I had to set up my own store to sell it. I've experienced such amazing results in my own life, I really wanted to share it with others," explains Lisa McDonald founder of LisasHealthyLifestyle.com . 
LMJM Internet Marketing, LLC is an online retailer of Youngevity products. The Company is excited to be a resource for an entire product line that is focused on total body wellness, longevity and health. 
The new online store at www.LisasHealthyLifestyle.com offers a variety of products within the following categories: Vitamins & Minerals, Energy Support, Mineral Make Up, Non GMO Food, Kona Coffee and many other product categories. Their products can be purchased at wholesale prices if customers sign up through the preferred customer program. 
"What I love about the line is that it is comprehensive, extremely high quality and sustainably sourced. There are so many products to choose from that you can select exactly what you need based on your individual goals," continues McDonald. "I have so much energy and feel vibrant when I take these products. They are the perfect complement to a healthy lifestyle - and the best part is they're affordable!" 
As a complement to the online store, customers may visit an informative blog at www.YourSustainableSelf.com to learn how to use the products to sustain a healthy body, mind and planet. 
LisasHealthyLifeStyle.com accepts all major credit cards and items purchased can be shipped throughout 83 countries worldwide. 
For more information on LMJM Internet Marketing, LLC and its new online store, visit www.LisasHealthyLifestyle.com . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/lmjm-internet-marketing-llc-announces-launch-of-website-offering-youngevity-health-products-at-lisashealthylifestylecom-with-complementary-blog-at-yoursustainableselfcom-300154097.html 
SOURCE LMJM Internet Marketing, LLC
